TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Timer extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class Timer Inherits Component Implements ISupportInitialize
type Timer = class inherit Component interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: Generates an event after a set interval, with an option to generate recurring events.

span.span: Generates an event after a set interval, with an option to generate recurring events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件是伺服器為基礎的計時器引發個的毫秒數之後，應用程式中的事件經過屬性。The component is a server-based timer that raises an event in your application after the number of milliseconds in the property has elapsed. 您可以設定物件，以引發此事件一次或重複使用屬性。You can configure the object to raise the event just once or repeatedly using the property. 一般而言， ，讓它會保持在範圍內，只要在需要物件宣告類別層級。Typically, a object is declared at the class level so that it stays in scope as long as it is needed. 然後您可以處理其事件以提供正常處理。You can then handle its event to provide regular processing. 例如，假設您有重要的伺服器，必須保持在 24 小時一天、 一週 7 天。For example, suppose you have a critical server that must be kept running 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. 您可以建立使用服務定期檢查的伺服器，並確保系統已啟動並執行的物件。You could create a service that uses a object to periodically check the server and ensure that the system is up and running. 如果系統沒有回應，服務可能嘗試重新啟動伺服器，或通知系統管理員。If the system is not responding, the service could attempt to restart the server or notify an administrator. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別不是適用於所有.NET 實作和版本，例如.NET 標準 1.6 版和較低版本。The class is not available for all .NET implementations and versions, such as .NET Standard 1.6 and lower versions. > 在這些情況下，您可以使用類別。In these cases, you can use the class instead. 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 以伺服器為基礎類別設計用於與多執行緒環境中的背景工作執行緒。The server-based class is designed for use with worker threads in a multithreaded environment. 伺服器計時器可以在執行緒之間移動處理所引發事件，導致更多的精確度，比在時間上引發事件的 Windows 計時器。Server timers can move among threads to handle the raised event, resulting in more accuracy than Windows timers in raising the event on time. 元件引發事件，根據的值 （以毫秒為單位） 的屬性。The component raises the event, based on the value (in milliseconds) of the property. 您可以處理這個事件來執行您所需要的處理。You can handle this event to perform the processing you need. 例如，假設您有連續張貼至資料庫的銷售訂單的線上銷售應用程式。For example, suppose that you have an online sales application that continuously posts sales orders to a database. 服務傳送的指示進行編譯的訂單，而非個別處理每筆訂單的批次作業。The service that compiles the instructions for shipping operates on a batch of orders rather than processing each order individually. 您可以使用啟動的批次處理序每隔 30 分鐘。You could use a to start the batch processing every 30 minutes. > [!IMPORTANT] > System.Timers.Timer 類別有系統時鐘為相同的解析度。The System.Timers.Timer class has the same resolution as the system clock. 這表示事件就會引發，如果系統時鐘的解析度所定義的間隔屬性小於系統時鐘的解析度。This means that the event will fire at an interval defined by the resolution of the system clock if the property is less than the resolution of the system clock. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. 當設`false`、物件引發事件只能出現一次，第一個之後經過。When is set to `false`, a object raises the event only once, after the first has elapsed. 保留提高事件會定期在所定義的間隔，將至`true`，這是預設值。To keep raising the event regularly at the interval defined by the , set to `true`, which is the default value. 元件會攔截，且會抑制所有事件處理常式擲回的例外狀況事件。The component catches and suppresses all exceptions thrown by event handlers for the event. 此行為是未來的.NET Framework 版本中可能會變更。This behavior is subject to change in future releases of the .NET Framework. 不過請注意，這是不一樣的事件處理常式以非同步方式執行，且包含`await`運算子 （C# 中） 或`Await`運算子 （在 Visual Basic)。Note, however, that this is not true of event handlers that execute asynchronously and include the `await` operator (in C#) or the `Await` operator (in Visual Basic). 這些事件處理常式中擲回的例外狀況傳播回到呼叫的執行緒，如下列範例所示。Exceptions thrown in these event handlers are propagated back to the calling thread, as the following example illustrates. 如需非同步方法中擲回的例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)。For more information on exceptions thrown in asynchronous methods, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md). [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cs/AsyncHandlerEx1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/vb/AsyncHandlerEx1.vb#3)] 如果屬性是`null`、事件會在引發執行緒。If the property is `null`, the event is raised on a thread. 如果處理事件持續時間超過，可能會再次引發事件，在另一台執行緒。If processing of the event lasts longer than , the event might be raised again on another thread. 在此情況下，事件處理常式應該是可重新進入。In this situation, the event handler should be reentrant. > [!NOTE] > 事件處理方法可能會在一個執行緒上同時執行的另一個執行緒呼叫方法或設定屬性`false`。The event-handling method might run on one thread at the same time that another thread calls the method or sets the property to `false`. 這可能會導致之後停止計時器所引發的事件。This might result in the event being raised after the timer is stopped. 範例程式碼方法示範一種避免競爭情形的方式。The example code for the method shows one way to avoid this race condition. 即使不`null`，之後就可能發生的事件或呼叫方法之後或屬性已設定為`false`，因為引發訊號事件一律排入佇列以便在執行緒集區執行緒上執行。Even if is not `null`, events can occur after the or method has been called or after the property has been set to `false`, because the signal to raise the event is always queued for execution on a thread pool thread. 其中一種方式來解決這種競爭情形是設定的旗標的事件處理常式來忽略後續事件的事件。One way to resolve this race condition is to set a flag that tells the event handler for the event to ignore subsequent events. 如果您使用與使用者介面項目，例如表單或控制項，而不會在該使用者介面項目，讓計時器的類別指派給表單或控制項，其中包含至屬性，使事件封送處理至使用者介面執行緒。If you use the class with a user interface element, such as a form or control, without placing the timer on that user interface element, assign the form or control that contains the to the property, so that the event is marshaled to the user interface thread. 如需預設執行個體的屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of default property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!TIP] > 請注意，.NET 包含四個類別，名為`Timer`，每個提供不同功能的：Be aware that .NET includes four classes named `Timer`, each of which offers different functionality: > > - （本主題）： 固定間隔引發事件。 (this topic): fires an event at regular intervals. 類別僅供做為伺服器為基礎或在多執行緒環境; 中的服務元件它沒有使用者介面，並在執行階段看不到。The class is intended for use as a server-based or service component in a multithreaded environment; it has no user interface and is not visible at runtime. > - ： 在執行緒集區執行緒上定期執行的單一回呼方法。: executes a single callback method on a thread pool thread at regular intervals. 計時器會具現化，且無法變更時，會定義回呼方法。The callback method is defined when the timer is instantiated and cannot be changed. 像類別，這個類別僅供做為伺服器或服務的元件，多執行緒環境中使用，不過它沒有使用者介面，並在執行階段看不到。Like the class, this class is intended for use as a server-based or service component in a multithreaded environment; it has no user interface and is not visible at runtime. > - (.NET framework): Windows Form 元件的固定間隔引發事件。 (.NET Framework only): a Windows Forms component that fires an event at regular intervals. 元件沒有使用者介面，設計在單一執行緒的環境中使用。The component has no user interface and is designed for use in a single-threaded environment. > - (.NET framework): 以固定間隔執行非同步或同步網頁回傳的 ASP.NET 元件。 (.NET Framework only): an ASP.NET component that performs asynchronous or synchronous web page postbacks at a regular interval. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化`System.Timers.Timer`物件，就會引發其事件每隔兩秒鐘 （2000 毫秒為單位），設定事件的事件處理常式，並啟動計時器。The following example instantiates a `System.Timers.Timer` object that fires its event every two seconds (2,000 milliseconds), sets up an event handler for the event, and starts the timer. 此事件處理常式的值顯示屬性會引發此事件每次。The event handler displays the value of the property each time it is raised. [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cs/timer2a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/vb/timer2a.vb#2)]

value.span: 如果 應於每次間隔耗盡時引發 事件，則為 ；如果應該在第一次間隔耗盡後只引發 事件一次，則為 。

span.span: if the should raise the event each time the interval elapses; if it should raise the event only once, after the first time the interval elapses.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果時已啟用呼叫方法時，會重設間隔。If the is already enabled when the method is called, the interval is reset. 如果是`false`、必須呼叫方法，才能再次開始計數。If is `false`, the method must be called in order to start the count again. 重設間隔會影響當就會引發事件。Resetting the interval affects when the event is raised. 例如，如果您設定為 5 秒的間隔，然後再設定屬性`true`，計數開始時間設定。For example, if you set the interval to 5 seconds and then set the property to `true`, the count starts at the time is set. 如果您 10 秒時此計數是 3 秒，重設間隔第一次 13 秒之後，就會引發事件屬性設定為`true`。If you reset the interval to 10 seconds when the count is 3 seconds, the event is raised for the first time 13 seconds after the property was set to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立其1.5 秒之後的事件引發。The following example creates a whose event fires after 1.5 seconds. 其事件處理常式接著會顯示"Hello World ！"Its event handler then displays "Hello World!" 在主控台中。on the console. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer.Timer1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Timer.Timer1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer.Timer1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Timer.Timer1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer.Timer1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Timer.Timer1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Timers.TimersDescription("Occurs when the Interval has elapsed.")

span.span: Occurs when the interval elapses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件，如果屬性是`true`所定義的時間間隔 （以毫秒為單位） 和屬性超過。The event is raised if the property is `true` and the time interval (in milliseconds) defined by the property elapses. 如果屬性是`true`，在所定義的間隔內重複引發此事件屬性; 否則就會引發此事件一次，第一次值超過。If the property is `true`, the event is raised repeatedly at an interval defined by the property; otherwise, the event is raised only once, the first time the value elapses. 如果後會設定已啟動，計數重設。If is set after the has started, the count is reset. 例如，如果您設定為 5 秒的間隔，然後再設定至`true`，計數開始時間設定。For example, if you set the interval to 5 seconds and then set to `true`, the count starts at the time is set. 如果您 10 秒時計數是 3 秒，重設間隔第一次 13 秒之後，就會引發事件設`true`。If you reset the interval to 10 seconds when count is 3 seconds, the event is raised for the first time 13 seconds after was set to `true`. 如果屬性是`null`、事件會在引發執行緒。If the property is `null`,the event is raised on a thread. 如果處理事件持續時間超過，可能會再次引發事件，在另一台執行緒。If the processing of the event lasts longer than , the event might be raised again on another thread. 在此情況下，事件處理常式應該是可重新進入。In this situation, the event handler should be reentrant. > [!NOTE] > 事件處理方法可能會在一個執行緒上同時執行的另一個執行緒呼叫方法或設定屬性`false`。The event-handling method might run on one thread at the same time that another thread calls the method or sets the property to `false`. 這可能會導致之後停止計時器所引發的事件。This might result in the event being raised after the timer is stopped. 範例程式碼方法示範一種避免競爭情形的方式。The example code for the method shows one way to avoid this race condition. 即使不`null`，之後就可能發生的事件或呼叫方法之後或屬性已設定為`false`，因為引發訊號事件一律排入佇列以便在執行緒集區執行緒上執行。Even if is not `null`, events can occur after the or method has been called or after the property has been set to `false`, because the signal to raise the event is always queued for execution on a thread pool thread. 其中一種方式來解決這種競爭情形是設定的旗標的事件處理常式來忽略後續事件的事件。One way to resolve this race condition is to set a flag that tells the event handler for the event to ignore subsequent events. 元件會攔截，且會抑制所有事件處理常式擲回的例外狀況事件。The component catches and suppresses all exceptions thrown by event handlers for the event. 此行為是未來的.NET Framework 版本中可能會變更。This behavior is subject to change in future releases of the .NET Framework. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，就會引發其事件每隔兩秒鐘 （2000年毫秒為單位），設定事件的事件處理常式，並啟動計時器。The following example instantiates a object that fires its event every two seconds (2000 milliseconds), sets up an event handler for the event, and starts the timer. 此事件處理常式的值顯示屬性會引發此事件每次。The event handler displays the value of the property each time it is raised. [!code-cpp[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cpp/timer1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cs/timer1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/vb/timer1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`true`等同於呼叫，而設定至`false`等同於呼叫。Setting to `true` is the same as calling , while setting to `false` is the same as calling . > [!NOTE] > 要引發的訊號事件一定在佇列執行執行緒。The signal to raise the event is always queued for execution on a thread. 這可能會導致之後所引發事件屬性設定為`false`。This might result in the event being raised after the property is set to `false`. 程式碼範例方法顯示其中一種方式解決這種競爭情形。The code example for the method shows one way to work around this race condition. 如果設`true`和設為`false`、引發經過事件一次，第一個時間間隔。If is set to `true` and is set to `false`, the raises the event only once, the first time the interval elapses. 如果間隔的設定之後已啟動，計數重設。If the interval is set after the has started, the count is reset. 例如，如果您設定為 5 秒的間隔，然後再設定屬性`true`，計數開始時間設定。For example, if you set the interval to 5 seconds and then set the property to `true`, the count starts at the time is set. 如果您 10 秒時計數是 3 秒，重設間隔第一次 13 秒之後，就會引發事件設`true`。If you reset the interval to 10 seconds when count is 3 seconds, the event is raised for the first time 13 seconds after was set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 視覺化的設計工具，例如在 Microsoft Visual Studio 中，設定屬性`true`時插入新。Some visual designers, such as those in Microsoft Visual Studio, set the property to `true` when inserting a new . ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，就會引發其事件每隔兩秒鐘 （2000年毫秒為單位），設定事件的事件處理常式，並啟動計時器。The following example instantiates a object that fires its event every two seconds (2000 milliseconds), sets up an event handler for the event, and starts the timer. 此事件處理常式的值顯示屬性會引發此事件每次。The event handler displays the value of the property each time it is raised. [!code-cpp[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cpp/timer1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cs/timer1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/vb/timer1.vb#1)]

The default is 100 milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來判斷的頻率引發事件。You use the property to determine the frequency at which the event is fired. 因為類別取決於系統時鐘，其具有的系統時鐘為相同的解析度。Because the class depends on the system clock, it has the same resolution as the system clock. 這表示事件就會引發，如果系統時鐘的解析度所定義的間隔屬性小於系統時鐘的解析度。This means that the event will fire at an interval defined by the resolution of the system clock if the property is less than the resolution of the system clock. 下列範例會設定5 毫秒的屬性。The following example sets the property to 5 milliseconds. 在上執行時[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]系統的系統時鐘已的解析度大約 15 毫秒，事件引發，大約每隔 15 毫秒，而不是每隔 5 毫秒。When run on a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] system whose system clock has a resolution of approximately 15 milliseconds, the event fires approximately every 15 milliseconds rather than every 5 milliseconds. [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer.interval/cs/interval2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer.Interval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer.interval/vb/interval2.vb#1)] 若要判斷目前系統上的系統時鐘的解析度，您可以使用下列程式碼：You can use the following code to determine the resolution of the system clock on the current system: [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer.Interval#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer.interval/cs/resolution1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer.Interval#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer.interval/vb/resolution1.vb#2)] 如果您的應用程式需要比所提供更高的解析度類別或系統時鐘，使用高解析度的多媒體計時器，請參閱 < [How to： 使用 High-Resolution 計時器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa964692.aspx)。If your app requires greater resolution than that offered by the class or the system clock, use the high-resolution multimedia timers; see [How to: Use the High-Resolution Timer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa964692.aspx). 如果間隔的設定之後已啟動，計數重設。If the interval is set after the has started, the count is reset. 例如，如果您設定為 5 秒的間隔，然後再設定屬性`true`，計數開始時間設定。For example, if you set the interval to 5 seconds and then set the property to `true`, the count starts at the time is set. 如果您 10 秒時計數是 3 秒，重設間隔第一次 13 秒之後，就會引發事件設`true`。If you reset the interval to 10 seconds when count is 3 seconds, the event is raised for the first time 13 seconds after was set to `true`. 如果設`true`和設為`false`、引發經過事件一次，第一個時間間隔。If is set to `true` and is set to `false`, the raises the event only once, the first time the interval elapses. 然後將設定為`false`。 is then set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都設定為`false`，以及計時器先前已啟用，設定屬性原因一次，引發的事件，如同屬性已設定為`true`.If and are both set to `false`, and the timer has previously been enabled, setting the property causes the event to be raised once, as if the property had been set to `true`. 若要設定的間隔，而不會引發事件，您可以暫時設定屬性`true`，將屬性所需的時間間隔，然後立即設定屬性設回`false`。To set the interval without raising the event, you can temporarily set the property to `true`, set the property to the desired time interval, and then immediately set the property back to `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，就會引發其事件每隔兩秒鐘 （2000年毫秒為單位），設定事件的事件處理常式，並啟動計時器。The following example instantiates a object that fires its event every two seconds (2000 milliseconds), sets up an event handler for the event, and starts the timer. 此事件處理常式的值顯示屬性會引發此事件每次。The event handler displays the value of the property each time it is raised. [!code-cpp[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cpp/timer1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cs/timer1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/vb/timer1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Starts raising the event by setting to .

span.span: Starts raising the event by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果稱為和設`false`、引發經過事件一次，第一個時間間隔。If is called and is set to `false`, the raises the event only once, the first time the interval elapses. 如果稱為和是`true`、引發事件第一個時間間隔經過，而且會持續引發的事件上指定的時間間隔。If is called and is `true`, the raises the event the first time the interval elapses and continues to raise the event on the specified interval. 您也可以藉由設定啟動計時至`true`。You can also start timing by setting to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 如果是`false`、必須呼叫方法，才能再次開始計數。If is `false`, the method must be called in order to start the count again. 呼叫方法計時器被啟用時沒有任何作用。A call to the method when the timer is enabled has no effect.

exception.span: The is created with an interval equal to or greater than + 1, or set to an interval less than zero.

span.span: The is created with an interval equal to or greater than + 1, or set to an interval less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: Stops raising the event by setting to .

span.span: Stops raising the event by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以藉由設定停止時間至`false`。You can also stop timing by setting to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 要引發的訊號事件一定在佇列執行執行緒，因此事件處理方法可能會在相同執行緒上執行的時間，呼叫另一個執行緒上執行的方法。The signal to raise the event is always queued for execution on a thread, so the event-handling method might run on one thread at the same time that a call to the method runs on another thread. 這可能會導致之後所引發事件方法呼叫。This might result in the event being raised after the method is called. 下一節的程式碼範例會示範一種方法解決這種競爭情形。The code example in the next section shows one way to work around this race condition. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化`System.Timers.Timer`物件，就會引發其事件每隔兩秒鐘 （2000 毫秒為單位），設定事件的事件處理常式，並啟動計時器。The following example instantiates a `System.Timers.Timer` object that fires its event every two seconds (2,000 milliseconds), sets up an event handler for the event, and starts the timer. 此事件處理常式的值顯示屬性會引發此事件每次。The event handler displays the value of the property each time it is raised. 當使用者按下 Enter 鍵時，在應用程式呼叫方法，然後再結束應用程式。When the user presses the Enter key, the application calls the method before terminating the application. [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/cs/timer2a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.timers.timer/vb/timer2a.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範一個方法，可以讓呼叫的執行緒方法無法繼續，直到目前執行事件就會結束，並同時避免兩個執行事件處理常式在相同的事件（通常稱為重新進入） 的時間。The following code example shows one way to prevent the thread that calls the method from continuing until a currently executing event ends, and also to prevent two events from executing the event handler at the same time (often referred to as reentrancy). 此範例會執行 100 的測試回合。The example executes 100 test runs. 每次執行測試，而間隔為 150 毫秒啟動計時器。Each time the test is run, the timer is started with an interval of 150 milliseconds. 事件處理常式使用方法，以模擬隨機而變動長度為 50 到 200 毫秒中的工作。The event handler uses the method to simulate a task that randomly varies in length from 50 to 200 milliseconds. 測試方法也會啟動控制執行緒，等待第二個和停止計時器。The test method also starts a control thread that waits for a second and then stops the timer. 如果在處理事件時控制執行緒停止計時器，控制執行緒必須等到完成事件，然後再繼續。If an event is being handled when the control thread stops the timer, the control thread must wait until the event is finished before proceeding. 方法多載用來避免重新進入，並防止控制執行緒正在執行的事件結束為止。The method overload is used to avoid reentrancy and to prevent the control thread from continuing until an executing event ends. 事件處理常式使用方法，以將控制項設定變數設為 1，但前提是此值目前為零。The event handler uses the method to set a control variable to 1, but only if the value is currently zero. 這是不可部分完成的作業。This is an atomic operation. 如果傳回的值為零，控制變數已設定為 1，事件處理常式會繼續。If the return value is zero, the control variable has been set to 1 and the event handler proceeds. 如果傳回的值為非零，會忽略事件以避免重新進入。If the return value is non-zero, the event is simply discarded to avoid reentrancy. (如果它是要執行每個事件，類別會是更好的方式同步處理的事件。)事件處理常式結束時，會將控制變數回設為零。(If it were necessary to execute every event, the class would be a better way to synchronize the events.) When the event handler ends, it sets the control variable back to zero. 範例記錄的執行，因為重新進入，已捨棄的而且之後所發生的事件總數呼叫方法。The example records the total number of events that executed, that were discarded because of reentrancy, and that occurred after the method was called. 控制執行緒使用方法，以將控制項設定變數設為-1 （減一），但前提是此值目前為零。The control thread uses the method to set the control variable to -1 (minus one), but only if the value is currently zero. 不可部分完成的作業會傳回非零，如果目前正在執行一個事件。If the atomic operation returns non-zero, an event is currently executing. 控制執行緒等候，而且會嘗試一次。The control thread waits and tries again. 範例記錄控制執行緒必須等待事件結束的次數。The example records the number of times the control thread had to wait for an event to finish. [!code-csharp[Timer.Stop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Timer.Stop/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Timer.Stop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Timer.Stop/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Timers.TimersDescription("The object used to marshal the event handler calls issued when an interval has elapsed.")

summary.span: Gets or sets the object used to marshal event-handler calls that are issued when an interval has elapsed.

span.span: Gets or sets the object used to marshal event-handler calls that are issued when an interval has elapsed.

value.span: ，表示用來封送處理事件處理常式呼叫 (當間隔已經耗盡時所發出) 的物件。

span.span: The representing the object used to marshal the event-handler calls that are issued when an interval has elapsed.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`null`，處理的方法系統執行緒集區執行緒上呼叫事件。When is `null`, the method that handles the event is called on a thread from the system-thread pool. 如需有關系統執行緒集區的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on system-thread pools, see . 當事件由 visual 的 Windows Form 元件，例如按鈕，存取元件透過系統執行緒集區可能結果的例外狀況，或只是可能會無法運作。When the event is handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a button, accessing the component through the system-thread pool might result in an exception or just might not work. 藉由設定避免這種效果給 Windows Form 元件時，這會導致處理的方法事件建立元件的相同執行緒上呼叫。Avoid this effect by setting to a Windows Forms component, which causes the method that handles the event to be called on the same thread that the component was created on. > [!NOTE] > 即使屬性不是`null`，之後就可能發生的事件或呼叫方法之後或屬性已設定為`false`，因為要引發的訊號事件一律排入佇列以便在執行緒集區執行緒上執行。Even if the property is not `null`, events can occur after the or method has been called or after the property has been set to `false`, because the signal to raise the event is always queued for execution on a thread pool thread. 其中一種方式來解決這種競爭情形是設定的旗標的事件處理常式來忽略後續事件的事件。One way to resolve this race condition is to set a flag that tells the event handler for the event to ignore subsequent events. 如果在 Windows Form 設計工具中，Visual Studio 內使用會自動設定為包含的控制項。If the is used inside Visual Studio in a Windows Forms designer, is automatically set to the control that contains the . 例如，如果您將的設計工具上`Form1`(繼承自)、屬性設為執行個體`Form1`。For example, if you place a on a designer for `Form1` (which inherits from ), the property of is set to the instance of `Form1`. ## Examples 下列範例是非常簡單的文字檔案編輯器所做的 Windows Form 應用程式。The following example is a Windows Forms app that serves as a very simple text file editor. 當尚未儲存的文字，在文字方塊中時，應用程式會要求使用者在一分鐘的時間間隔是否要儲存文字方塊的內容。When the text in the text box has not been saved, the app asks the user at one-minute intervals whether he or she wants to save the contents of the text box. 若要這樣做，屬性設定為 1 分鐘 （60000 毫秒為單位），而屬性設定為物件。To do this, the property is set to one minute (60,000 milliseconds), and the property is set to the object. [!code-csharp[System.Timers.Timer.SynchronizingObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Timers.Timer.SynchronizingObject/cs/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Timers.Timer.SynchronizingObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Timers.Timer.SynchronizingObject/vb/Form1.vb#1)] 這個範例需要下列控制項加入表單：The example requires that you add the following controls to the form: - A控制項，名為`TextBox1`（其預設名稱）。A control named `TextBox1` (its default name). - A控制項，名為`Button1`（其預設名稱）。A control named `Button1` (its default name). - A控制項，名為`SaveSaveFileDialog1`（其預設名稱）。A control named `SaveSaveFileDialog1` (its default name) .
